body:
WARNING: At least one of the links in the message below goes to an IP address (e.g.
10.1.1.1), which could be malicious. To learn how to protect yourself, please go here:
http://www.lbl.gov/cyber/services/suspicious-links.html




... hmm, I did leave the "/" behind the port (or whatever 3389 is). I am using Safari ...


On Aug 24, 2011, at 7:06 PM, Lars O. Grobe wrote:


> --------
> WARNING: At least one of the links in the message below goes to an IP address (e.g.
> 10.1.1.1), which could be malicious. To learn how to protect yourself, please go here:
> http://www.lbl.gov/cyber/services/suspicious-links.html
> --------
> 
> Hi!
> 
> http://128.3.180.13:3389/listen.mu3
> 
> leads to a server-generated "The file you requested could not be found".
> 
> http://128.3.180.13:3389
> 
> leads to a server-generated error 403 "access denied".
> 
> Both tested on Chromium, as I could not open the stream.
> 
> Cheers, Lars.
> 
>
